name: Tennis Orcs Beta
description:
Whack the tennis ball to clear obstacles and conquer your foes! Really, you just need to get to the exit. 

Controls: 

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

P to hit the ball

O to serve the ball

I to recall the ball to you

You gain HP if you hit a target or go through the door

If the game breaks, reload the page.
